snippet: A panel that was formed after last year’s tornadoes devastated the state, has called for a better system of warnings that would incorporate global positioning technology and smart phones.
abstract: Alabama panel formed after tornadoes devastated the state in 2011 calls for a better system of warnings that would incorporate global positioning technology and smart phones; panel criticizes tornado sirens, which have lost credibility among many residents.
lead_paragraph: A panel that was formed after last year’s tornadoes devastated the state, has called for a better system of warnings that would incorporate global positioning technology and smart phones.
